comments:
Detailed problem report is here:
http://saloon.javaranch.com/cgi-bin/ubb/ultimatebb.cgi?ubb=get_topic&f=12&t=003232

Wizard does not complete, it appears as though the cause is: 
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jst.server.generic.core 4 1 2005-08-17 10:44:58.695
!MESSAGE Error loading the server type definition
!STACK 0
Wrapped exception
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.FeatureNotFoundException: Feature 'isLibrary' not
found. (bundleentry://207/serverdef/geronimo10.serverdef, 76, 51)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLHandler.reportUnknownFeature(XMLHandler.java:1201)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLHandler.handleUnknownFeature(XMLHandler.java:1171)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLHandler.setAttribValue(XMLHandler.java:1828)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.SAXXMLHandler.handleObjectAttribs(SAXXMLHandler.java:145)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLHandler.createObjectFromFactory(XMLHandler.java:1378)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLHandler.createObjectFromFeatureType(XMLHandler.java:1350)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLHandler.createObject(XMLHandler.java:1245)
let me know if you need anymore information.  i'll be available all next week,
but will be taking vacation for a week and then some thereafter (but available
and happy to help beyond that)
Created an attachment (id=26234)
fuller clipping from .log file
Created an attachment (id=26235)
screenshot
Can you confirm which build of WTP you have?  Are you using 0.7, or one of the
later (or earlier) builds?
the help-about-plugins dialog says WTP 0.7.  a full listing of my plugins
directory follows.  let me know if something strikes you as potentially
erroneous.  i'm happy to remove particular items if doing so sheds light on the
issue...

it should have been obvious, but i have been using wtp 0.7 (stable) and not the
1.0 m4 release called for in tim's article.  i'm presently doing another clean
install of eclipse 3.1, wtp 1.0 m5, and geronimo plugin.  will later advise how
this goes.  suspect it will be fine seeing as how a major step (0.7 vs. 1.0) was
munged.
Created an attachment (id=26324)
log from eclipse 3.1, wtp 1.0m5, geronimo plugin
using eclipse 3.1, wtp 1.0 m5 and geronimo plugin did not work.  log file
attached w/ 8/20 date.  tim's article called for m4, but seeing the same problem
with 0.7 and with m5 makes me think not using m4 specifically was not significant.

had used the following downloads:

eclipse-SDK-3.1-win32.zip
emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-I200506230200.zip
JEM-SDK-I20050623.zip
GEF-SDK-3.1RC4.zip
wtp-1.0M5.zip
org.eclipse.jst.server.geronimo.core_1.0.0.zip

the log file entries appeared upon eclipse startup.  i'd like to keep trying,
and so will do this again with eclipse 3.0 and report on the result.

our use of myeclipse broke when we upgraded to 3.1.  also having problems with
jboss plugin.
Reassigning this bug to Sachin (as it's his code now)
Fixed in apache repo.
This change is a bulk update of all _un_targeted, fixed, resolved bugs upon release of M5. This particular bug _might_ have been fixed earlier than M5. (Feel free to correct). 

Closing, as per Sachin's comments
